content: > if you d like to support me and my > designing or leave a tip for the free > pattern you can leave it here 1 looking for a little more than a vanilla sock for your striping sock yarn summer stripes sock series patterns are perfect for you garden patch works perfectly with self-striping sock yarn this design is two simple rib patterns that are excellent for the first time sock knitter or the knitter looking for a pattern that looks great with stripes i have included where to insert a contrast heel flap if it is desired but it s not necessary please tag @allknitup on instagram #allknitupdesigns #allknitup if you have any questions or just love all knit up designs patterns join us at the ravelry group 2 happy knitting sierra 1 https //ko-fi com/allknitupdesigns 2 https //www ravelry com/groups/all-knit-up-designs
